original: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: @1b #// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya sum cu pa /
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya sum cu pa /
translated: Volume 30

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis @2a #//
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis @2a #//
translated: The thusness of form is the thusness of the Tathāgata. The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of form.

original: su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of form and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of feeling is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de //
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of feeling.

original: de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of feeling and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of perception is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of perception.

original: de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin @2b nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin @2b nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of perception and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of volitional factors is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of volitional factors.

original: de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of volitional factors and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of consciousness.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mig @3a #// gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mig @3a #// gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the eyes is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the eyes.

original: de ltar na mig gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mig gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the eyes and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the ears is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the ears.

original: de ltar na rna ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rna ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the ears and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sna'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the nose is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the nose.

original: de ltar na sna'i de bzhin nyid dang / de @3b bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sna'i de bzhin nyid dang / de @3b bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the nose and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: lce'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the tongue is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the tongue.

original: de ltar na lce'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na lce'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the tongue and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The suchness of the body is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the body.

original: de ltar na lus kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na lus kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the body and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the mind is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the mind.

original: de ltar na yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the mind and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of form is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of form.

original: de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of form and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of sound is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @4a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @4a *//
translated: The thusness of the tathāgatas🔽

original: nyid kyis sgra'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: nyid kyis sgra'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of sound is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na sgra'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sgra'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of sound and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.🔽The suchness of smell is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: dri'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of smell.🔽Thus, the suchness of smell and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.🔽The suchness of taste is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dri'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dri'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of taste.🔽Thus, the suchness of taste and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: de ltar na dri'i de bzhin nyid dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dri'i de bzhin nyid dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The suchness of tangibles is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: ro'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of tangibles.🔽Thus, the suchness of tangibles and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.🔽The suchness of mental phenomena is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ro'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ro'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of mental phenomena.

original: de ltar na ro'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ro'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of mental phenomena and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: reg gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of contact is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis reg gi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis reg gi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of contact.

original: de ltar na reg gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na reg gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of contact and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of mental phenomena is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chos kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chos kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of mental phenomena.

original: de ltar na chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar @4b med do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar @4b med do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of mental phenomena and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of eye consciousness is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of eye consciousness.

original: de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the eye consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the ear consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the ear consciousness.

original: de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the ear consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the nose consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the nose consciousness.

original: de ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the nose consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the tongue consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de @5a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de @5a *//
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the tongue consciousness.

original: gnyis su byar med do //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med do // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the tongue consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the body consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the body consciousness.

original: de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the consciousness of the body and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the mind consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the mind consciousness.

original: de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the mind consciousness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the sensory contact of the eye is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the union of nose and its object and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the union of tongue and its object is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the union of tongue and its object.

original: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the union of tongue and its object and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the union of body and its object is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the union of body and its object.

original: de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the totality of the body’s contact and the thusness of the Tathā­gata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the totality of mental contact is the thusness of the Tathā­gata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @6a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @6a *//
translated: The thusness of the Tathā­gata is the thusness of the totality of mental contact.

original: pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the totality of mental contact and the thusness of the Tathā­gata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the feeling that arises from the totality of contact through the eye is the thusness of the Tathā­gata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathā­gata is the thusness of the feeling that arises from the totality of contact through the eye.

original: de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of eye, form, and consciousness, and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and consciousness.

original: de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of ear, sound, and consciousness, and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of nose, smell, and consciousness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the tathāgatas is the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of the nose, a sense object, and the consciousness that experiences that sense object.

original: de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis @6b su byar med do //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis @6b su byar med do // lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of the nose, a sense object, and the consciousness that experiences that sense object, and the thusness of the tathāgatas are not two, nor are they divided into two.🔽The thusness of the tathāgatas is the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of the tongue, a sense object, and the consciousness that experiences that sense object.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of the tongue, a sense object, and the consciousness that experiences that sense object is the thusness of the tathāgatas.

original: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the feeling that arises from the union of the tongue, a sense object, and the consciousness that experiences that sense object, and the thusness of the tathāgatas are not two, nor are they divided into two.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the feelings that arise from the coming together of body, sensory contact, and perception is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the feelings that arise from the coming together of body, sensory contact, and perception.

original: de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the feelings that arise from the coming together of body, sensory contact, and perception and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the feelings that arise from the coming together of mind, sensory contact, and perception is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the feelings that arise from the coming together of mind, sensory contact, and perception.

original: de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the feelings that arise from the contact of mental phenomena and the suchness of the Tathā­gata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid @7a *//
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid @7a *//
translated: The suchness of the earth element is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the earth element.

original: de ltar na sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the earth element and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the water element is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the water element.

original: de ltar na chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the water element and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the fire element is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the fire element.

original: de ltar na me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the fire element and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the wind element is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the wind element.

original: de ltar na rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the wind element and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: the suchness of the realm of space is the suchness of the Tathāgata;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @7b nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @7b nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the realm of space.

original: de ltar na nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the realm of space and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the consciousness element is the suchness of the Tathāgata;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the consciousness element.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the consciousness element and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of ignorance is the suchness of the Tathāgata;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of ignorance is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of ignorance and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two but indivisible.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of volitional factors is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of volitional factors.🔽Thus, the suchness of volitional factors and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two but indivisible.

original: de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do; ;rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do; ;rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of consciousness is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of consciousness.

original: de ltar @8a *//
analyzed: de ltar @8a *//
translated: Thus,

original: na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The suchness of consciousness and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of name-and-form is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of name-and-form.

original: de ltar na ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of name-and-form and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the six sense fields is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the six sense fields.

original: de ltar na skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the six sense fields and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of contact is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis reg pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of contact.

original: de ltar na reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na reg pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of contact and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of feeling is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of feeling.

original: de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @8b pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @8b pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // sred pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of feeling and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of craving is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sred pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sred pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of craving.

original: de ltar na sred pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sred pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of craving and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of grasping is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis len pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis len pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of grasping.

original: de ltar na len pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na len pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of grasping and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of existence is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis srid pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis srid pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of existence.

original: de ltar na srid pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na srid pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of existence and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of birth is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis skye ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis skye ba'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of birth.

original: de ltar na skye ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na skye ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of birth and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @9a *//
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @9a *//
translated: The suchness of old age and death is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: nyid kyis rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: nyid kyis rga shi'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of old age and death.

original: de ltar na rga shi'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rga shi'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of old age and death and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the perfection of giving is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the perfection of generosity is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the perfection of generosity and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the perfection of moral discipline is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de; de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de; de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the perfection of moral discipline. Thus, the thusness of the perfection of moral discipline and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the perfection of patience is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the perfection of patience is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the perfection of patience and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin @9b nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin @9b nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the perfection of effort is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the perfection of effort.

original: de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the perfection of effort and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the perfection of concentration is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the perfection of concentration is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the perfection of concentration and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the perfection of wisdom is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the perfection of wisdom and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of inner emptiness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of inner emptiness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med @10a *//
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med @10a *//
translated: Thus, the thusness of inner emptiness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual;

original: de gnyis su byar med do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de gnyis su byar med do // phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: they are not divided into two.🔽The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of outer emptiness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of outer emptiness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.🔽Thus, the thusness of outer emptiness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual;

original: de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: they are not divided into two.🔽The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of outer and inner emptiness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of outer and inner emptiness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the external and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of emptiness is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of emptiness and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of great extent is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of great extent.

original: de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la @10b gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la @10b gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the great and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of the compounded is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of the compounded.

original: de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin @11a *//
analyzed: de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin @11a *//
translated: That being so, it is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽🔽

original: nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited and the suchness of the Tathā­gata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited is the suchness of the Tathā­gata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of the unlimited and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is the suchness of the Tathāgata,🔽and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the suchness of the Tathāgata,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of non-rejection is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the emptiness of non-rejection and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual, not to be divided into two.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of inherent existence is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the emptiness of inherent existence and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual, not to be divided into two.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis @11b de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis @11b de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of all phenomena as emptiness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of all phenomena as emptiness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of defining characteristics is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the emptiness of defining characteristics and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of nonapprehension is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the emptiness of non-apprehension and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual, not divided into two.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of non-things is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the emptiness of non-things.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de @12a *//🔽gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de @12a *// gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the emptiness of non-things and the thusness of the Tathāgata are non-dual, not divided into two.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence and the suchness of the Tathāgata are nondual and indivisible.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things and the suchness of the Tathāgata are nondual and indivisible.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the applications of mindfulness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the applications of mindfulness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of the right efforts is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin @12b nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin @12b nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the right efforts.

original: de ltar na yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the right efforts and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the legs of manifestation is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the legs of manifestation.

original: de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the bases of supernatural power and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the faculties is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dbang po'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dbang po'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the faculties.

original: de ltar na dbang po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na dbang po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the faculties and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the powers is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the powers.

original: de ltar na stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the powers and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the factors of awakening is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @13a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @13a *//
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the factors of awakening.

original: pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the factors of awakening and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
