translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the noble eightfold path.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the noble eightfold path and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the noble truths is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the noble truths.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the noble truths and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the concentrations is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the concentrations.

original: de ltar na bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the concentrations and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the formless [absorptions] is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshad med pa'i de @13b bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshad med pa'i de @13b bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the immeasurable is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the immeasurable and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the formless absorptions.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the formless absorptions and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be made two.

original: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the liberations is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the liberation gateways and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the serial absorptions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the serial absorptions is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the serial absorptions and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de @14a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de @14a *//
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, which are gateways to liberation.

original: bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the face.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the superknowledges.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the superknowledges is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the superknowledges and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of samādhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of samādhi is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of samādhi and the suchness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @14b pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs @14b pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways and the suchness of the Tathāgata are non-dual and indivisible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata’s powers is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the powers of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the powers of the Tathāgata and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The thusness of fearlessness is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of fearlessness.

original: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of fearlessness and the thusness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The thusness of the correct understandings is the thusness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the correct understandings.

original: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the correct understandings and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of great love is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @15a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin @15a *//
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of great love.

original: nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of great love and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of great compassion is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid do /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of great compassion.

original: de ltar na snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de //
analyzed: de ltar na snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do; ;sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de //
translated: Thus, the suchness of great compassion and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the result of stream enterer is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the result of stream enterer.

original: de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the result of stream enterer and the thusness of the Tathā­gata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de //
translated: The thusness of the result of once-returner is the thusness of the Tathā­gata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathā­gata is the thusness of the result of once-returner.

original: de ltar na @15b lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na @15b lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the thusness of the result of once-returner and the thusness of the Tathā­gata are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The thusness of the result of non-returner is the thusness of the Tathā­gata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Tathā­gata is the thusness of the result of non-returner.

original: de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the fruit of non-returning and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of an arhat,

original: dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: and the suchness of an arhat is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar na dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of an arhat and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The suchness of individual enlightenment is the suchness of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of individual enlightenment.

original: de ltar na rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of a pratyekabuddha and the suchness of a tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of path aspects is the suchness of a tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /🔽de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes @16a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de / de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes @16a *//
translated: The suchness of a tathāgata is the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects.

original: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the knowledge of path aspects and the suchness of a tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is the suchness of a tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The suchness of a tathāgata is the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the Tathāgata are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'di ni / rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'di ni / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
translated: this is the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings, having fully awakened to that suchness,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: attain the name of ‘Tathāgata.’

original: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
translated: When this chapter on suchness was being taught,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
translated: this great trichiliocosm shook in six ways:

original: g-yos so // rab tu g-yos so; ;kun tu g-yos so //
analyzed: g-yos so // rab tu g-yos so; ;kun tu g-yos so //
translated: it trembled, trembled strongly, and trembled intensely;🔽it quivered, quivered strongly, and quivered intensely;

original: 'gul to // rab tu 'gul to //🔽kun tu 'gul to //
analyzed: 'gul to // rab tu 'gul to // kun tu 'gul to //
translated: it shook, shook strongly, and shook intensely;🔽it trembled, trembled strongly, and trembled intensely;

original: ldeg go / rab tu ldeg go /🔽kun tu ldeg go /🔽chem chem / rab tu chem chem /🔽kun tu chem chem mo; ;'ur 'ur /
analyzed: ldeg go / rab tu ldeg go / kun tu ldeg go / chem chem / rab tu chem chem / kun tu chem chem mo; ;'ur 'ur /
translated: it quaked, quaked strongly, and quaked intensely;🔽it roared, roared strongly, and roared intensely;

original: rab tu 'ur 'ur /
analyzed: rab tu 'ur 'ur /
translated: it rumbled, rumbled strongly, and rumbled intensely;🔽and it crashed, crashed strongly, and crashed intensely.

original: kun tu 'ur 'ur ro //🔽shig shig / rab tu shig shig /
analyzed: kun tu 'ur 'ur ro // shig shig / rab tu shig shig /
translated: They shook, shook strongly, and shook intensely.🔽They quivered, quivered strongly, and quivered intensely.

original: kun tu shig shig go /🔽shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/
analyzed: kun tu shig shig go / shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/
translated: They trembled, trembled strongly, and trembled intensely.🔽When the east rose, the west sank.

original: shar @16b phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho /🔽byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/
analyzed: shar @16b phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho / byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma'/
translated: When the west rose, the east sank.🔽When the north rose, the south sank.

original: byang phyogs dma' na ni lho phyogs mtho /
analyzed: byang phyogs dma' na ni lho phyogs mtho /
translated: When the south rose, the north sank.

original: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/
analyzed: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/
translated: When the center rose, the periphery sank.

original: dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to //
analyzed: dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to //
translated: When the periphery rose, the center sank.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis /
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm🔽scattered, rained down, and let fall divine sandalwood powder

original: bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye mas gtor /🔽mngon par gtor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsandan gyi phye mas gtor / mngon par gtor /
translated: on the Blessed One and the elder Subhūti.

original: mngon par rab tu gtor nas /
analyzed: mngon par rab tu gtor nas /
translated: Having scattered, rained down, and let fall🔽divine sandalwood powder,

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: they exclaimed:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One!

original: de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do //
translated: It is amazing how this elder Subhūti, through the suchness of the Tathāgata, has been born after the Tathāgata.”

original: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste /
translated: Then the elder Subhūti, taking up the thread of the conversation of those gods,

original: lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to those gods:

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: “In that case,

original: lha'i bu dag /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag /
translated: divine princes,

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: the elder Subhūti has not arisen in the wake of form,

original: gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than form.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not arisen in the wake of the suchness of form,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than the suchness of form.

original: tshor ba'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: tshor ba'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not arisen in the wake of feeling,

original: tshor ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: tshor ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than feeling.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not arisen in the wake of the suchness of feeling,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than the suchness of feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not arisen in the wake of perception,

original: 'du shes las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽'du shes @17a *//
analyzed: 'du shes las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // 'du shes @17a *//
translated: nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than perception.

original: kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He has not arisen in the wake of the suchness of perception,🔽nor has he arisen in the wake of anything other than the suchness of perception.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise from the suchness of perception.

original: 'du byed kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: 'du byed las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'du byed las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise from anything other than volitional factors.🔽It does not arise from the suchness of volitional factors.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise from the suchness of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /

original: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

original: mig gi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: mig gi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: mig las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // mig gi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes //
translated: not born from the emptiness of essential nature other than the emptiness of essential nature,🔽not born from the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: not born from the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature other than the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: not born from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence,🔽not born from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence other than the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He does not follow anything other than the suchness of the emptiness of non-existent things.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He does not follow the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He does not follow anything other than the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su @24a *// ma skyes so //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

original: mthar gya  gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: mthar gya  gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He does not arise subsequent to the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation.🔽He does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation.

translated: He does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are gates of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He does not arise subsequent to anything other than the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su @25b ma skyes so //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anywhere else other than the meditative stabilities.

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from the suchness of the meditative stabilities.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anywhere else other than the suchness of the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anywhere else other than the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anywhere else other than the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /

original: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He is not born from anything other than the suchness of the fearlessnesses.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: He is not born from anything other than the correct understandings.🔽He is not born from the suchness of the correct understandings.

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: He is not born from anything other than the suchness of the correct understandings.

analyzed: snying rje chen po las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: they do not arise in the wake of anything other than great compassion;

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: they do not arise in the wake of the suchness of great compassion;

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: they do not arise in the wake of anything other than the suchness of great compassion.🔽They do not arise in the wake of the distinct attributes of a buddha;🔽they do not arise in the wake of anything other than the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: they do not arise in the wake of the suchness of the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so; ;rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so; ;rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from the result of stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anything other than the result of stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from the suchness of the result of stream enterer.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anything other than the suchness of the result of stream enterer.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from the result of once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from anything other than the result of once-returner.🔽They do not arise from the suchness of the result of once-returner.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de @26b bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de @26b bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: They do not arise from anything other than the suchness of the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: They do not arise from the result of non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the fruit of non-returning.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the fruit of non-returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the state of a worthy one.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: rang byang chub las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rang byang chub las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: it does not arise subsequent to the knowledge of the aspects of the path,

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the knowledge of the aspects of the path,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so /
translated: and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'dus @27a *// byas kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'dus @27a *// byas kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the compounded,

original: 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the compounded.

original: 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the compounded,🔽and it does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the compounded.

original: 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise subsequent to the suchness of the unconditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise subsequent to anything other than the suchness of the unconditioned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis rjes su skyed pa dang / gang rjes su bskyed pa dang; gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis rjes su skyed pa dang / gang rjes su bskyed pa dang; gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang / gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
analyzed: gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /
translated: Because all those phenomena—that which arises subsequently, that by which it arises subsequently, that which is arisen subsequently, that by which it is arisen subsequently, that which will arise subsequently, and that by which it will arise subsequently—are non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang; chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste /
translated: The suchness, the unmistaken suchness, the unaltered suchness, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, the very limit of reality, and the inconceivable element are profound.

original: de la gzugs mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la gzugs mi dmigs /
translated: In it, form is not apprehended.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of form is not apprehended.

original: gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even form is not apprehended,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of form be apprehended?

original: de la tshor ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la tshor ba mi dmigs /
translated: In it, feeling is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid @27b mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid @27b mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of feeling is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even feeling is not apprehended,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of feeling be apprehended?

original: de la 'du shes mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la 'du shes mi dmigs /
translated: In it, perception is not apprehended.

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of perception is not apprehended.

original: 'du shes nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even perception is not apprehended,

original: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of perception be apprehended?

original: de la 'du byed mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la 'du byed mi dmigs /
translated: In it, volitional factors are not apprehended.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: 'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since compositional activity itself is not apprehended,

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of compositional activity be apprehended?🔽Consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since consciousness itself is not apprehended,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of consciousness be apprehended?

original: de la mig mi dmigs /🔽mig gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la mig mi dmigs / mig gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The eyes are not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the eyes is not apprehended.

original: mig nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mig nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the eyes themselves are not apprehended,

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the eyes be apprehended?

original: de la rna ba mi dmigs /🔽rna ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la rna ba mi dmigs / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The ears are not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the ears is not apprehended.

original: rna ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rna ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the ears themselves are not apprehended,

original: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the ears be apprehended?

original: de la sna mi dmigs /🔽sna'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la sna mi dmigs / sna'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The nose is not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the nose is not apprehended.

original: sna nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sna nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the nose itself is not apprehended,🔽how could the suchness of the nose be apprehended?

original: sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the nose be observed?

original: de la lce mi dmigs /🔽lce'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la lce mi dmigs / lce'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The tongue is not observed there.🔽The suchness of the tongue is not observed.

original: lce nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lce nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the tongue itself is not observed,

original: lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the tongue be observed?

original: de la lus mi dmigs /🔽@28a *// lus kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la lus mi dmigs / @28a *// lus kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: lus nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lus nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the body itself is not observed,

original: lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the body be observed?

original: de la yid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la yid mi dmigs /
translated: The mind is not observed there.

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the mind is not observed.

original: yid nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: yid nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the mind itself is not observed,

original: yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la gzugs mi dmigs /🔽gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la gzugs mi dmigs / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: Form is not observed there.🔽The suchness of form is not observed.

original: gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la sgra mi dmigs /🔽sgra'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la sgra mi dmigs / sgra'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: how could the suchness of form be observed?🔽Sound is not observed there.🔽The suchness of sound is not observed.

original: sgra nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sgra nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since sound itself is not observed,

original: sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of sound be observed?

original: de la dri mi dmigs /🔽dri'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la dri mi dmigs / dri'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: In it, smell is not observed.🔽The suchness of smell is not observed.

original: dri nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dri nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since smell itself is not observed,

original: dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la ro mi dmigs /🔽ro'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la ro mi dmigs / ro'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: In it, taste is not observed.🔽The suchness of taste is not observed.

original: ro nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ro nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since taste itself is not observed,

original: ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of taste be observed?

original: de la reg mi dmigs /🔽reg gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la reg mi dmigs / reg gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: In it, tactility is not observed.🔽The suchness of tactility is not observed.

original: reg nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: reg nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: reg gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la chos mi dmigs /

original: chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: chos kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /

original: mig gi rnam par shes @28b pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes @28b pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of eye consciousness is not observed.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the eye consciousness be apprehended?

original: de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
translated: In this regard, the ear consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the ear consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the ear consciousness itself is not apprehended,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the ear consciousness be apprehended?🔽In this regard, the nose consciousness is not apprehended.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the nose consciousness is not apprehended.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the nose consciousness itself is not apprehended,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /

translated: how could the suchness of the feeling that arises from contact at the body be apprehended?🔽In this regard, the feeling that arises from contact at the mind is not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from contact at the mind is not apprehended.

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned be apprehensible?

original: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also non-apprehensible.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: and the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes possibly be apprehended?

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid @33a *//🔽kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid @33a *// kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: The emptiness of what is not rejected is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of what is not rejected is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of what is not rejected possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible.

original: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: So how could the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of all phenomena is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of all phenomena possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of defining characteristics is non-apprehensible,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of defining characteristics possibly be apprehended?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned is non-apprehensible.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: So how could the suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is non-apprehensible,

original: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: and the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned possibly be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of the inexpressible is non-apprehensible,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the emptiness of the inexpressible is non-apprehensible.🔽So how could the suchness of the emptiness of the inexpressible possibly be apprehended?

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: So how could the suchness of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes possibly be apprehended?

original: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of nature is non-apprehensible,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

analyzed: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not apprehended, how could the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature be apprehended?

original: de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not apprehended.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is not apprehended.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the applications of mindfulness are not apprehended,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la yang dag par spong ba @34a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la yang dag par spong ba @34a *//
translated: how could the suchness of the applications of mindfulness be apprehended?

original: rnams mi dmigs /🔽yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnams mi dmigs / yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The right efforts are not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the right efforts is not apprehended.

original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the right efforts are not apprehended,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the correct exertions be observed?

original: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The bases of supernatural powers are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the bases of supernatural powers is non-apprehensible.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the bases of supernatural powers themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the bases of supernatural powers be observed?

original: de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs /
translated: The faculties are non-apprehensible,

original: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the faculties is non-apprehensible.

original: dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the faculties themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the faculties be observed?

original: de la stobs rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la stobs rnams mi dmigs /
translated: The powers are non-apprehensible,

original: stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the powers is non-apprehensible.

original: stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the powers themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the powers be observed?

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs /
translated: The branches of enlightenment are non-apprehensible,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the aspects of enlightenment is non-apprehensible.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible,🔽the suchness of the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: since the noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible,

original: @34b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: @34b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the noble eightfold path be apprehended?

original: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: “In this regard, the noble truths are non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the noble truths is non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: since the noble truths are non-apprehensible,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the noble truths be apprehended?

original: de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs /
translated: “In this regard, the meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of meditative stability is non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs / tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the limitless states are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the limitless states is non-apprehensible.

original: tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The limitless states themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the formless absorptions are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the formless absorptions is non-apprehensible.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The formless absorptions themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: so how could the suchness of the formless absorptions possibly be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, the aspects of liberation are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the aspects of liberation is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la mthar gyis @35a *//

original: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
