analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the serial formulations of meditative absorption be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, the emptiness gate of liberation is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the emptiness gate of liberation is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are also non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation be apprehended?

original: de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs /

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the higher knowledges is non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the higher knowledges themselves are non-apprehensible,

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs /

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the meditative stabilizations themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the meditative stabilizations be apprehended?

original: de la gzungs kyi sgo @35b rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la gzungs kyi sgo @35b rnams mi dmigs /

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas is non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na; de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: and the powers of the tathāgatas themselves are non-apprehensible, so how could the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas be apprehensible?

original: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te; mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs / mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te; mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: “In this regard, the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,🔽the suchness of the fearlessnesses is non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the suchness of the individual correct knowledges be apprehended?

original: de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs /🔽snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “Great compassion is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of great compassion is non-apprehensible.

original: snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since great compassion is non-apprehensible,

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of great compassion be apprehended?🔽“The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is non-apprehensible.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @36a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa @36a *//
translated: Since the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha

original: nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: are non-apprehensible,

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha be apprehended?🔽“The fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of stream enterer itself is non-apprehensible,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of once-returner itself is non-apprehensible,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the suchness of the result of once-returner be apprehended?

original: de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The result of non-returner itself is non-apprehensible,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: so how could the suchness of the result of non-returner be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If even the state of an arhat is non-apprehensible, how could the suchness of the state of an arhat be apprehended?

original: de la rang byang chub mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rang byang chub mi dmigs /

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of self-awakening is non-apprehensible.

original: rang byang chub nyid kyang @36b mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang byang chub nyid kyang @36b mi dmigs na /
translated: If even self-awakening is non-apprehensible,

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of self-awakening be apprehended?

original: de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: “Here, the knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible,

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / de de bzhin no //

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /

analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If feelings that arise from the union of ear and sound are not apprehended, how could the suchness of feelings that arise from the union of ear and sound be apprehended?

original: de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
translated: In this regard, feelings that arise from the union of nose and smell are not apprehended.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The suchness of feelings that arise from the union of nose and smell is not apprehended.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If feelings that arise from the union of nose and smell are not apprehended, how could the suchness of feelings that arise from the union of nose and smell be apprehended?

original: de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
translated: In this regard, feelings that arise from the union of tongue and taste are not apprehended.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of feelings that arise from the union of tongue and taste is not apprehended.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the feeling that arises from the union of tongue and taste is not apprehended,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga @39b la 'gyur /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga @39b la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the feeling that arises from the union of tongue and taste be apprehended?

original: de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /
translated: “In this regard, the feeling that arises from the union of body and touch is not apprehended.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the feeling that arises from the union of body and touch is not apprehended.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the feeling that arises from the union of body and touch is not apprehended,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the feeling that arises from the union of body and touch be apprehended?

original: de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the feeling that arises from the union of mind and mental phenomena is not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the feeling that arises from the union of mind and mental phenomena is not apprehended.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the feeling that arises from the union of mind and mental phenomena is not apprehended,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of feelings that arise from the condition of mental contact be a reference point?

original: de la sa'i khams mi dmigs /🔽sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la sa'i khams mi dmigs / sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the earth element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the earth element is also non-apprehensible.

original: sa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the earth element itself is non-apprehensible,

original: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the earth element be a reference point?

original: de la chu'i khams mi dmigs /🔽chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la chu'i khams mi dmigs / chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the water element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the water element is also non-apprehensible.

original: chu'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chu'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the water element itself is non-apprehensible,

original: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the water element be a reference point?

original: de la me'i khams mi dmigs /🔽me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la me'i khams mi dmigs / me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, the fire element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the fire element is also non-apprehensible.

original: me'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: me'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the fire element itself is non-apprehensible,

original: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rlung gi khams mi dmigs /🔽rlung @40a *// gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rlung gi khams mi dmigs / rlung @40a *// gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: how could the suchness of the fire element be a reference point?🔽“In this regard, the wind element is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the wind element is also non-apprehensible.

original: rlung gi khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the wind element itself is non-apprehensible,

original: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the element of wind be observed?

original: de la nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs /🔽nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs / nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The element of space is not observed there.🔽The suchness of the element of space is not observed there.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the element of space itself is not observed,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the element of space be observed?

original: de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs /
translated: The element of consciousness is not observed there.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the element of consciousness is not observed there.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the element of consciousness itself is not observed,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the element of consciousness be observed?

original: de la ma rig pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la ma rig pa mi dmigs /
translated: Ignorance is not observed there.

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of ignorance is not observed there.

original: ma rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since ignorance itself is not observed,

original: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la 'du byed mi dmigs /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la 'du byed mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of ignorance be observed?🔽Formative factors are not observed there.

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of formative factors is not observed there.

original: 'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If formations are not apprehended,

original: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of formations be apprehended?

original: de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: Consciousness is not apprehended; the suchness of consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If consciousness itself is not apprehended,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of consciousness be apprehended?

original: de la ming @40b dang gzugs mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la ming @40b dang gzugs mi dmigs /
translated: Name and form are not apprehended;

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of name and form is not apprehended.

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If name and form themselves are not apprehended,

original: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of name and form be apprehended?

original: de la skye mched drug mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la skye mched drug mi dmigs /
translated: The six sense sources are not apprehended;

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the six sense sources is not apprehended.

original: skye mched drug nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the six sense sources themselves are not apprehended,

original: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la reg pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la reg pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the six sense sources be apprehended?🔽Contact is not apprehended;

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of contact is not apprehended.

original: reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since contact itself is non-apprehensible,

original: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la tshor ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la tshor ba mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of contact possibly be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, feeling is non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of feeling is non-apprehensible.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since feeling itself is non-apprehensible,

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la sred pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la sred pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of feeling possibly be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, craving is non-apprehensible,

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of craving is non-apprehensible.

original: sred pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since craving itself is non-apprehensible,

original: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of craving possibly be apprehended?

original: de la len pa mi dmigs /🔽len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la len pa mi dmigs / len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this regard, grasping is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of grasping is non-apprehensible.

original: len pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: len pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since grasping itself is non-apprehensible,

original: len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la srid pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la srid pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of grasping possibly be apprehended?🔽“In this regard, becoming is non-apprehensible,

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of becoming is non-apprehensible.

original: srid pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since becoming itself is non-apprehensible,

original: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of becoming possibly be apprehended?

original: de la skye ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la skye ba mi dmigs /
translated: “In this regard, birth is non-apprehensible,

original: skye ba'i de bzhin @41a *//🔽nyid mi dmigs te /🔽skye ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin @41a *// nyid mi dmigs te / skye ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the suchness of birth is non-apprehensible,🔽and birth itself is non-apprehensible.

original: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If birth itself is non-apprehensible, how could the suchness of birth be apprehensible?

original: de la rga shi mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rga shi mi dmigs /
translated: In it, aging and death are non-apprehensible,

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te / rga shi nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: and the suchness of aging and death is non-apprehensible.

original: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If aging and death itself are non-apprehensible, how could the suchness of aging and death be apprehensible?

original: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: In it, the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: and the suchness of the transcendent perfection of generosity is non-apprehensible.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If the transcendent perfection of generosity itself is non-apprehensible, how could the suchness of the transcendent perfection of generosity be apprehensible?

original: de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: In it, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is non-apprehensible,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline is non-apprehensible.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline itself is non-apprehensible,🔽how could the suchness of the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline be apprehensible?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the perfection of morality be a reference point?

original: de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: In this regard, the perfection of patience is not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the perfection of patience is not apprehended.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the perfection of patience itself is not apprehended,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the perfection of patience be a reference point?

original: de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: In this regard, the perfection of diligence is not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the perfection of diligence is not apprehended.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @41b nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @41b nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the perfection of diligence itself is not apprehended,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the perfection of diligence be a reference point?🔽In this regard, the perfection of concentration is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the perfection of concentration is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is non-apprehensible,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the perfection of meditative stability be apprehended?

original: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs //
analyzed: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs //
translated: “The perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the perfection of wisdom itself is non-apprehensible,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the perfection of wisdom be apprehended?

original: de la nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: “Inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,🔽the suchness of inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te; nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te; nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: if inner emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of inner emptiness be apprehended?🔽“Outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: if outer emptiness is non-apprehensible,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: How could suchness of external emptiness be observed?🔽Internal and external emptiness is not observed there.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of internal and external emptiness is not observed.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even internal and external emptiness is not observed,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of internal and external emptiness be observed?

original: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi @42a *//
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi @42a *//
translated: Emptiness of emptiness is not observed there.

original: dmigs / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dmigs / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even emptiness of emptiness is not observed,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of emptiness of emptiness be observed?

original: de la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: Emptiness of great emptiness is not observed there.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of emptiness of great emptiness is not observed.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even emptiness of great emptiness is not observed,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: How could the suchness of the emptiness of the great be observed?🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is not observed there.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate is not observed there.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the emptiness of the ultimate be observed?🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is not observed there.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned is not observed there.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the emptiness of the conditioned is not observed,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the emptiness of the conditioned be observed?

original: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not observed there.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is not observed there.🔽The suchness of the emptiness of what transcends limits is not observed.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs @42b na /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs @42b na /
translated: Since the emptiness of what transcends limits is not observed,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness of what is not rejected is not observed there.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of what is not rejected is not observed.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the emptiness of what is not rejected is not observed,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: how could suchness of the emptiness of what is not rejected be observed?🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is not observed there.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence is not observed.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: so how could the suchness of the emptiness of nonrejection be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is also non-apprehensible,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the suchness of the emptiness of inherent existence be apprehended?

original: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs /🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of all things is also non-apprehensible,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: so how could the suchness of the emptiness of all things be apprehended?🔽The emptiness of its own mark is non-apprehensible,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the emptiness of its own mark is non-apprehensible.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la mi dmigs pa @43a *//

original: stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also non-apprehensible,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the emptiness of non-things is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the emptiness of essential nature is also non-apprehensible,🔽so how could the suchness of the emptiness of essential nature be apprehended?

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of things is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of things is also non-apprehensible,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of things possibly be apprehended?

original: de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs /

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this context, the bases of spiritual accomplishment are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the bases of spiritual accomplishment is non-apprehensible.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The bases of spiritual accomplishment themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la dbang po rnams mi dmigs /

original: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

original: dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la stobs rnams mi dmigs /🔽stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

translated: “In this context, the powers are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the powers is non-apprehensible.

original: stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The powers themselves are non-apprehensible,🔽so how could the suchness of the powers be apprehended?

original: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs na; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /

original: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs /

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the noble eightfold path is not observed.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even the noble eightfold path is not observed,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga @44a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga @44a *//

analyzed: la 'gyur / de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: Therein, the noble truths are not observed.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the noble truths is not observed.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even the noble truths are not observed,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the noble truths be apprehended?

original: de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs /
translated: “In this context, the concentrations are not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the concentrations is not apprehended.

original: bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the concentrations themselves are not apprehended,

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the concentrations be apprehended?

original: de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs / tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this context, the immeasurables are not apprehended.🔽The suchness of the immeasurables is not apprehended.

original: tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the immeasurables themselves are not apprehended,

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the immeasurables be apprehended?

original: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: “In this context, the formless absorptions are not apprehended.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the formless absorptions is not apprehended.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: Since the formless absorptions themselves are not apprehended, how could the suchness of the formless absorptions be apprehended?

original: de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs /

original: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the real nature of the liberations is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the real nature of the liberations possibly be appr­hended?

original: de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @44b par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms @44b par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: The serial steps of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the real nature of the serial steps of meditative absorption is non-apprehensible.🔽If even the serial steps of meditative absorption are non-apprehensible,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs /
translated: how could the real nature of the serial steps of meditative absorption possibly be appr­hended?🔽The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the real nature of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation are also non-apprehensible,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: so how could the suchness of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation be apprehended?

original: de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs / mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this context, the clairvoyances are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the clairvoyances is also non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the clairvoyances themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the clairvoyances be apprehended?

original: de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs /🔽ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs / ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “In this context, the meditative stabilizations are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the meditative stabilizations is also non-apprehensible.

original: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the meditative stabilizations themselves are non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the meditative stabilizations be apprehended?🔽“In this context, the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible,

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways is also non-apprehensible.

original: gzungs kyi sgo @45a *//🔽nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo @45a *// nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: are non-apprehensible, and how could the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways be apprehended?

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “The powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas is non-apprehensible.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the powers of the tathāgatas be apprehended?

original: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: “The fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the fearlessnesses is non-apprehensible.🔽Since the fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible,

original: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the fearlessnesses be apprehended?

original: de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: “The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible,🔽and the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges is non-apprehensible.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Since the detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible,🔽how could the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges be apprehended?

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the detailed and thorough knowledges be a referential object?

original: de la byams pa chen po mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la byams pa chen po mi dmigs /
translated: Therein, great love is not apprehended.

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te / byams pa chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The suchness of great love is not apprehended.

original: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If even great love is not apprehended, how could the suchness of great love be a referential object?

original: de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs /
translated: Therein, great compassion is not apprehended.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te / snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The suchness of great compassion is not apprehended.

original: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid @45b lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid @45b lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If even great compassion is not apprehended, how could the suchness of great compassion be a referential object?

original: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs /
translated: Therein, the distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: The suchness of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not apprehended.🔽If even the distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended, how could the suchness of the distinct attributes of a buddha be a referential object?

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could the suchness of the distinct qualities of the Buddha be observed?

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
translated: “The result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the result of stream enterer itself is non-apprehensible,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could the suchness of the result of stream enterer possibly be observed?

original: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
translated: “The result of once-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If the result of once-returner itself is non-apprehensible,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the result of once-returner possibly be observed?🔽“The result of non-returner is non-apprehensible,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: and the suchness of the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: the fruit of non-returning is not apprehended,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of the fruit of non-returning be apprehended?🔽Arhatship is not apprehended,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of arhatship is not apprehended,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: if even arhatship is not apprehended,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la rang byang chub @46a *//
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la rang byang chub @46a *//
translated: how could the suchness of arhatship be apprehended?🔽Individual enlightenment is not apprehended,

original: mi dmigs / rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: mi dmigs / rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of individual enlightenment is not apprehended,

original: rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: if even individual enlightenment is not apprehended,

original: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /🔽de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur / de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: how could the suchness of individual enlightenment be apprehended?🔽The knowledge with aspects of the path is not apprehended,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: the suchness of the knowledge with aspects of the path is not apprehended,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na; lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur /
translated: If even the knowledge of the aspects of the path is non-apprehensible, how could the suchness of the knowledge of the aspects of the path be apprehended?

original: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs /
analyzed: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: If even the knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur ////
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur ////
translated: how could the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects be apprehended?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya so gnyis pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya so gnyis pa //
translated: Volume 222

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe /
translated: when this chapter on suchness, unmistaken suchness, and unaltered suchness was explained,

original: dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo //
translated: two hundred monks were liberated from defilements without grasping.

original: dge slong ma lnga brgya ni /
analyzed: dge slong ma lnga brgya ni /
translated: Five hundred nuns

original: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
analyzed: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
translated: The dust-free, stainless Dharma eye arose in them for the first time with regard to phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
translated: Five thousand bodhisattvas and gods and humans attained receptivity to the nonarising of phenomena.

original: byang chub @46b sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni /
analyzed: byang chub @46b sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni /
translated: Sixty bodhisattvas who had regressed

original: nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te /
translated: liberated their minds from defilements without grasping.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te /
translated: these bodhisattva great beings have served five hundred buddhas,

original: thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin /
analyzed: thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin /
translated: and in all those cases they have practiced generosity,

original: tshul khrims bsrungs /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs /
translated: maintained ethical discipline,

original: bzod pa bsgoms /
analyzed: bzod pa bsgoms /
translated: cultivated patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: exerted diligence,

original: bsam gtan bsgrubs /
analyzed: bsam gtan bsgrubs /
translated: attained concentration,

original: shes rab bsgoms kyang /
analyzed: shes rab bsgoms kyang /
translated: and cultivated wisdom.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing /
translated: However, they have not been taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas /🔽sbyin pa byin te /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas / sbyin pa byin te /
translated: and have not been taken hold of by skillful means.🔽They have practiced generosity

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: and thought, ‘This is generosity.’

original: 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o //
translated: I will give this in charity.

original: 'di ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims so //
translated: This is morality.

original: bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: I will observe it.

original: 'di ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bzod pa'o //
translated: This is patience.

original: bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate it.

original: 'di ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: 'di ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: This is effort.

original: bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o //
translated: I will make an effort.

original: 'di ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gtan no //
translated: This is meditation.

original: bdag gis ni mnyam par bzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni mnyam par bzhag par bya'o //
translated: I will concentrate.

original: 'di ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: 'di ni shes rab bo //
translated: This is wisdom.

original: bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o /
analyzed: bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o /
translated: I will cultivate it.

original: zhes tha dad par spyod pas /
analyzed: zhes tha dad par spyod pas /
translated: They practice them separately.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: They are without the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong /
translated: and are not held by skillful means. They give gifts,

original: tshul khrims srung /🔽bzod pa sgom /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom /
translated: observe morality,🔽cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom /
translated: make an effort,

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog /
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog /
translated: concentrate in meditation,

original: shes rab sgom par byed cing /🔽de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas /
analyzed: shes rab sgom par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas /
translated: and cultivate wisdom.

original: tha mi dad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: But because they practice with various perceptions,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so //
translated: they do not enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas🔽because of not apprehending non-difference.

original: de @47a *// dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas /
analyzed: de @47a *// dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs pas /
translated: They have not yet entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob /
translated: They have attained the fruit of entering the stream.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
translated: They have attained the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob /
translated: They have attained the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo //
translated: They have attained arhatship.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings have the path of emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'am /
translated: signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa yod mod kyi /
analyzed: smon pa med pa yod mod kyi /
translated: and wishlessness.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: But if they are without the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na /
translated: and are not held by skillful means,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas /🔽nyan thos sam /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas / nyan thos sam /
translated: they will actualize the very limit of reality🔽and become śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽why is it that those very phenomena of emptiness,

original: ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du 'dra'ang /
analyzed: ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du 'dra'ang /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: They are devoid of the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing /
translated: and they are devoid of skillful means. They actualize the very limit of reality,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la /
translated: and they become śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du bas kyang thabs mkhas pa la brten cing /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /

original: @47b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: @47b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba /

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma thob pas /
translated: Those who meditate only on the dharmas of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, without having attained skill in means,

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: will become śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni /

analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sgom zhing /

analyzed: thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,
