analyzed: dper na / bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am / dpag tshad nyis brgya pa'am /

analyzed: dpag tshad sum brgya pa'am /

analyzed: dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la /

analyzed: de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la /

analyzed: bya de la 'dab ma med pa zhig ste /

analyzed: de dzambu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas /

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs na /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: gal te bya de lam nas mal bdag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽de la @48a *//
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / de la @48a *//
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sam /

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de lta ma lags so //
analyzed: de lta ma lags so //
translated: that is not the case.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Śāradvatīputra,

original: gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par dzambu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na /
analyzed: gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par dzambu'i gling du 'dug par bya'o snyam na /

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

original: de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de la ji snyam du sems /

analyzed: bya de dzambu'i gling du ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram /

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: de ni ma lags so //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: de ni dzambu'i gling du lhung nas / smas pa 'am snad par yang 'gyur /

analyzed: 'gum pa'am gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro //

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de ltar lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis pa de ni /

original: de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo //
translated: There is no doubt that it will happen.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing /
translated: in the same way, bodhisattvas may give gifts for eons equal to the number of grains of sand in the Ganges River,

original: tshul khrims srung /🔽bzod pa sgom /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung / bzod pa sgom /
translated: They observe discipline,🔽cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom /
translated: exert vigor,

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa'ang che /
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa'ang che /
translated: and become absorbed in concentration.🔽Their aspirations are great,

original: de'i sems bskyed pa'ang che /
analyzed: de'i sems bskyed pa'ang che /

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang /
translated: and their retention is immeasurable.

original: @48b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: @48b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: But if they are devoid of the perfection of wisdom and are not upheld by skillful means,🔽they will fall to the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
translated: or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des /
translated: It is because those bodhisattvas

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin /
translated: have given gifts,

original: tshul khrims bsrungs /🔽bzod pa bsgoms /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs / bzod pa bsgoms /
translated: observed discipline,🔽cultivated patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: exerted vigor,

original: bsam gtan bsgrubs pas /
analyzed: bsam gtan bsgrubs pas /
translated: and become absorbed in concentration without the mind set on omniscience.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: Because that bodhisattva is separated from the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and is not held by skillful means,🔽he will fall to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
translated: or to the pratyekabuddha level.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,🔽when bodhisattvas think about the discipline,🔽concentration, wisdom, liberation, and the vision of the liberated wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing /
translated: of the thus-gone ones of the past, present, and future,

original: 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang /
analyzed: 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang /
translated: and grasp and form concepts about them,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes /
translated: they do not understand the thus-gone ones’ discipline,

original: ting nge 'dzin mi shes /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mi shes /
translated: they do not understand their concentration,

original: shes rab mi shes /
analyzed: shes rab mi shes /
translated: they do not understand their wisdom,

original: rnam par grol ba mi shes /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba mi shes /
translated: they do not understand their liberation,

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na /
translated: and they do not understand the vision of the liberated wisdom.

original: de mi shes /
analyzed: de mi shes /
translated: They do not understand that,

original: khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos nas /🔽de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te /
analyzed: khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos nas / de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te /
translated: Not understanding, when they hear the words ‘emptiness,’ ‘signless,’ and ‘wishless,’🔽they take them to be signs of peace.

original: des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing /🔽bla na med pa yang @49a *//
analyzed: des de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar bzung zhing / bla na med pa yang @49a *//
translated: Having taken them to be signs of peace,🔽they dedicate them to unsurpassed,

original: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: Bodhisattvas who dedicate in that way

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: will stand on the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi za'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi za'o //
translated: Because, lacking the perfection of wisdom and skill in means, they dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in that way.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Here, starting from the first production of the thought,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing /
translated: the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, not separated from the thought of complete knowing, gives gifts,

original: tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni /
translated: guards morality, accomplishes patience, undertakes perseverance, and becomes absorbed in concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral pa ste /
translated: He is not separated from the perfection of wisdom and skillful means.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan mar mi byed de /
translated: He does not take the morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and seeing of liberation of the past, future, and present lord buddhas as a causal sign.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
translated: He does not take the emptiness concentration as a causal sign.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
translated: He does not apprehend the signless meditative stabilization as a sign.

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin na /
translated: He does not apprehend the wishless meditative stabilization as a sign.

original: sh'a @49b radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a @49b radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: one should know that great bodhisattva beings will not come to abide in the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: it is because from the time when great bodhisattva beings first begin to set their mind on enlightenment,

original: sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: they give gifts without apprehending any attributes.

original: tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /🔽bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: They guard their morality without apprehending any attributes.🔽They cultivate tolerance without apprehending any attributes.

original: brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: They undertake perseverance without apprehending any attributes.

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: They become absorbed in meditative concentration without apprehending any attributes.

original: shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: They cultivate wisdom without apprehending any attributes.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: They do not apprehend the morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, or knowledge and seeing of liberation of the past, future, and present lord buddhas as signs.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo //
translated: They cultivate the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness meditative stabilizations but do not apprehend them as signs.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang; mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang; mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
translated: in that way, they give gifts with a mind free from signs, they guard morality with a mind free from signs, they cultivate patience with a mind free from signs, they make an effort at perseverance with a mind free from signs,

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam @50a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam @50a *//
translated: and they cultivate concentration with a mind free from signs.

original: gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /🔽mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
analyzed: gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to rest in equipoise on the ultimate. It is to cultivate wisdom with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate inner emptiness with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate outer emptiness with a mind free from marks.🔽It is to cultivate inner and outer emptiness with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate the emptiness of emptiness with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate the emptiness of great extent with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to cultivate the emptiness of ultimate reality with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate the emptiness of conditioned phenomena with a mind free from marks. It is to cultivate the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness that transcends limitations. It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness that is neither produced nor destroyed. It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness that is not discarded.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness of nature. It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness of all phenomena. It is to meditate with a mind free from marks on the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi @50b dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi @50b dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the emptiness of nonapprehending with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the emptiness of things that are not existent with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the emptiness of essence with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the emptiness of the essence of nonexistence with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the applications of mindfulness with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the right efforts with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the bases of miraculous power with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the faculties with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the powers with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the branches of awakening with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the noble eightfold path with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the noble truths with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the meditative stabilities with a mind free from marks. It is to meditate on the immeasurable aspirations with a mind free from marks.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar gyis @51a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar gyis @51a *//
translated: cultivating the formless absorptions with a mind free from signs,🔽cultivating the liberations with a mind free from signs,🔽

original: gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang /

translated: It is to meditate on the formless absorptions with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the liberations with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the serial absorptions with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the superknowledges with a mind free from attributes.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the meditative stabilities with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the dhāraṇī gateways with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the powers of the tathāgatas with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the fearlessnesses with a mind free from attributes.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /
translated: It is to meditate on the correct understandings with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on great compassion with a mind free from attributes. It is to meditate on the distinct aspects of the buddhas with a mind free from attributes.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang /

translated: the meditation on the result of once-returner with a mind free from signs, the meditation on the result of non-returner with a mind free from signs,

translated: the meditation on the state of a worthy one with a mind free from signs, the meditation on a pratyekabuddha’s awakening with a mind free from signs, the meditation on the knowledge of path aspects with a mind free from signs, and the meditation on the knowledge of all aspects with a mind free from signs.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: the emptiness of nonobservation,🔽the emptiness of nonentities,🔽the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: “It is the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam; byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: the powers, the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: and the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam /
translated: It is the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the meditative concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the immeasurable aspirations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
translated: the aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions,🔽the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
translated: the signlessness gate of liberation,🔽the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams sam /
translated: the higher knowledges,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /🔽byams pa chen po'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love,

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams @53a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams @53a *//
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sam; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: sam; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of stream enterer,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub bam /
analyzed: rang byang chub bam /
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam /
translated: or the knowledge of path aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos gang yang dmigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: chos gang yang dmigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: or any dharma at all.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Blessed One,🔽those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who are divorced from the transcendent perfection of wisdom and skillful means should be known as having doubts about unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi ba ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi ba ste; de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang /
translated: it is because those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas have given gifts while apprehending signs, and they have given gifts while apprehending something.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste bsgoms pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste bsgoms pas /
translated: In the same way, whatever morality they have observed, whatever patience they have cultivated, whatever perseverance they have begun, whatever concentration they have cultivated, whatever wisdom they have cultivated, they have cultivated it all while taking signs as a basis.

original: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: Therefore, Blessed One, we should understand that the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of those sons or daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas is doubtful.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i slad du @53b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas /
analyzed: de'i slad du @53b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas /
translated: therefore, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar rig par bgyi'o //
translated: should be known as being devoid of the perfection of wisdom and skillful means.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te /
translated: Abiding in the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
translated: one should practice generosity with a mind endowed with signlessness, in a manner free from apprehending.

original: tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o //🔽bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o // bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: One should guard morality.🔽One should cultivate patience.

original: brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o //
translated: One should undertake perseverance.

original: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o //
translated: One should attain meditative concentration.

original: shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o // nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should cultivate wisdom.🔽One should practice inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.🔽One should practice the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽One should practice the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽One should practice the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: @54a *// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: @54a *// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of non-entities.🔽One should practice the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o //
translated: One should practice the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.
